attributes.action: Allow Free Access To Military Service Records For Families Of The Deceased.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do families & ancestors of servicemen/women that die during their service have to pay to access the service records of the deceased. Surely when men and women make the ultimate sacrifice (Death) for their country then the least that they and their families, ancestors can expect is, free access to their military service records. The United States of America, allows free access, so why can't the UK Government?
